item.title: Creating a Blog With Hugo
item.description: Table Of Contents Setup Hugo and GitHub Pages Setup Hugo and GitHub Pages The first step to have AI replaces me is uses it to generate this blog site. Let’s try with ChatGPT Prompt Create a blog “ai.replaces.me” with hugo, a static page generator. It uses hugo theme PaperMod. The blog will host on GitHub Page with domain name ai.replaces.me. Create ci/cd pipelines with github actions. The site will deploy to github-pages environment by the github actions workflow.
